price: 37. La carne y la sangre (del animal sacrificado) no llegan a Al-lah, lo que Le llega es vuestra piedad. Y ha sometido (los camellos) a vuestra disposición para que proclaméis Su grandeza por haberos guiado. Y da buenas noticias (¡oh, Muhammad!) a los hombres de bien.
arabic: لَن يَنَالَ ٱللَّهَ لُحُومُهَا وَلَا دِمَآؤُهَا وَلَٰكِن يَنَالُهُ ٱلتَّقۡوَىٰ مِنكُمۡۚ كَذَٰلِكَ سَخَّرَهَا لَكُمۡ لِتُكَبِّرُواْ ٱللَّهَ عَلَىٰ مَا هَدَىٰكُمۡۗ وَبَشِّرِ ٱلۡمُحۡسِنِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: lan yanāla al-laha luḥūmuhā walā dimāuhā walākin yanāluhu al-taqwā minkum kadhālika sakharahā lakum litukabbirū al-laha ʿalā mā hadākum wabashiri al-muḥ'sinīna
